addr: 330 W. 42nd St.. WORKSHOP LOCATION: 4th floor. New York, NY
title: LPN Tuition Assistance Workshop (Manhattan)-REQUIRED Information Session for 1st time Tuition Assistance Applicants entering LPN programs ONLY
desc: LPN Tuition Assistance Workshop This workshop is required of all? FIRST TIME APPLICANTS ?for tuition assistance for? LPN programs. ? Please attend, BEFORE enrolling in a program.  Only certain programs are covered! ? Remember:   You MUST have made  1 FULL YEAR of employment, by the 1st day of the semester that you want to start  AND? be  Wage Class 1 or 2,  in order to receive Tuition Assistance.  ? Wage Class 3 or Per Diem employees are not eligible. ? Please arrive 15 minutes early, and bring a pen. Latecomers will not be allowed to enter, and will have to reschedule. Please plan ahead for travel delays
